name: Amazon Neptune
description: Organized per instance, per cluster, by role, and by database class.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(`aws.neptune.BackupRetentionPeriodStorageUsed.byInstance`) FROM Metric FACET entity.name TIMESERIES
SELECT max(`aws.neptune.ClusterReplicaLag.byInstance`) FROM Metric FACET entity.name TIMESERIES
SELECT max(`aws.neptune.ClusterReplicaLagMaximum.byInstance`) FROM Metric FACET entity.name TIMESERIES

SELECT max(`aws.neptune.LoaderRequestsPerSec.byInstance`) FROM Metric FACET entity.name TIMESERIES
